insert.selectKey: select count(1) from E_LP_HSTNAME where hisentnameid = #{hisentnameid}
insert.if: insert into E_LP_HSTNAME ( hisentnameid, pripid, entname, s_ext_fromnode, s_ext_datatime ) values ( #{hisentnameid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pripid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 440300, SYSDATE )
